column2: Carl - Thanks for starting off today with addressing how PMBOK 6 is out.  However, Susan did not address what replaced it.  I totally get it's more fluid but yesterday she indicated there is a framework.....'enablers/deliverables'.  What are Plan and Manage Scope, Plan and Manage Budget now called?  This Topics slide is called something on a test.  Thanks.
column5:
The enablers you referenced are based on the Exam Content Outline. The PMP ATP training uses the materials provided by PMI from their "PMI Authorized PMP Exam Prep", which we refer to in class as the Learner Kit. Their exam prep uses concepts from the Exam Content Outline. The outline is based on various publications (including PMBOK 6 and 7, and the Agile Practice Guide). We do not recommend reading all of the resources. Rather, your primary study source will be the information presented during the Bootcamp and your Learner Kit. You will learn more about the Learner kit and other recommended resources when you attend the training.

Exam Content Outline:
https://www.pmi.org/-/media/pmi/documents/public/pdf/certifications/project-management-professional-exam-outline.pdf
